descriptionHtml:
This is my 3rd release. Conan\'s Sword skin for Steel Greatsword. It looks pretty Epic if you like the tattoo then check out my 2nd release Epic Tattoo.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1014

____________
Installation
____________
Extract \"textures\" to ...\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder.


____________
Uninstall
____________
go into ...\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons folder, delete \"steel\" folder.
author: XeNoN69
